Applicant : Jardine, Sheila
School (district) : Arco Elementary School (Butte County School District #111)
Role(s) : Early Elementary Teacher (K-2nd);Upper Elementary Teacher (3rd+);Middle School Teacher;Title 1 Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I hope this externship will help me to make connections to the career workforce. It is always helpful to relate STEM to real life applications. This makes the learning come alive for students. The learning will have more meaning and more significance to students. 
This applicant likes work environments that are:

	* Hybrid
